meanings.definition: The state or quality of being comfortable or cozy.
meanings.sent1: The comfiness of the fluffy blanket made her fall asleep quickly.
meanings.sent2: I love the comfiness of my favorite chair by the fireplace.
meanings.sent3: The comfiness of the oversized sweater made her look like a cozy bear.
meanings.sent4: The comfiness of the hammock transported him to a state of pure relaxation.
meanings.sent5: The comfiness of the bed felt like a warm hug after a long day.

meanings.definition: A feeling of relaxation and contentment.
meanings.sent1: She sighed in pure comfiness as she sank into the soft cushions.
meanings.sent2: The comfiness of the room enveloped him, easing his stress away.
meanings.sent3: The comfiness of the hot cocoa brought a smile to her face on a chilly evening.
meanings.sent4: His comfiness after a good meal was evident in his satisfied expression.
meanings.sent5: The comfiness of the familiar surroundings put her at ease instantly.

meanings.definition: The level of comfort experienced in a particular situation.
meanings.sent1: The comfiness of the new shoes made walking a pleasure.
meanings.sent2: She rated the comfiness of the hotel room as top-notch.
meanings.sent3: The comfiness of the office chair made it hard for him to stay awake during meetings.
meanings.sent4: The comfiness of the temperature in the room was just right for a good night's sleep.
meanings.sent5: The comfiness of the sofa was unmatched, perfect for lazy Sunday afternoons.
